title: Algebraic representatives of the ratios $ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n}$ and $β(2n)/π^{2n-1}$
summary: In \cite{TallaWaffo2025arxiv2511.02843} we introduced even polynomials $Ξ_n,Λ_n\in\mathbb{Q}[x]$ arising from integral representations of $β(2n)/π^{2n-1}$ and $ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n}$. In this paper we give explicit closed formulae for these polynomials in terms of Eulerian numbers and study their structural properties. These properties may prove useful in studies on the arithmetic nature of the ratios $β(2n)/π^{2n}$ and $ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n+1}.$

AI.tldr: 该论文给出了偶数多项式Ξ_n和Λ_n的显式闭式公式，这些多项式源于β(2n)/π^{2n-1}和ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n}的积分表示，公式用欧拉数表示，并研究了它们的结构性质。
AI.motivation: 研究这些多项式的结构性质，可能有助于研究比值β(2n)/π^{2n}和ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n+1}的算术性质。
AI.method: 使用欧拉数给出了多项式Ξ_n和Λ_n的显式闭式公式，并分析了它们的结构特性。
AI.result: 获得了用欧拉数表示的Ξ_n和Λ_n多项式的显式公式，并揭示了它们的结构性质。
AI.conclusion: 这些多项式的结构性质可能为研究β(2n)/π^{2n}和ζ(2n+1)/π^{2n+1}的算术性质提供有用工具。

title: Complex Moments, Gamma and Riemann Zeta Functions unified by the Parabolic Mellin Transform
summary: We present a unified integral framework based on the Fourier-Laplace transform evaluated along a vertical line in the complex plane. By identifying the moment-generating function (MGF) of a random variable with the weights of these integrals, we first establish a general expression for complex fractional moments valid for any random variable with a MGF. Applying this formula to the Gaussian distribution, we recover a global integral representation for the reciprocal Gamma function that unifies it with its reflection. We formalize the underlying operator as the Parabolic Mellin Transform, a holomorphic alternative to the classical Mellin transform that avoids strips of convergence by mapping the vertical line to a parabolic contour. This general framework leads to new meromorphic representations for the Hurwitz and Riemann zeta functions that are valid throughout the critical strip, as well as reformulations of the Riemann hypothesis and the Lindelof hypothesis.

AI.tldr: 提出基于傅里叶-拉普拉斯变换的统一积分框架，通过将矩生成函数与积分权重关联，建立复分数矩的一般表达式，应用于高斯分布得到倒伽马函数的全局积分表示，形式化抛物型梅林变换，获得Hurwitz和黎曼zeta函数在整个临界带有效的亚纯表示，并重新表述黎曼假设和林德勒夫假设。
AI.motivation: 建立统一的积分框架来处理复分数矩问题，避免经典梅林变换中的收敛带限制，为特殊函数提供更广泛的表示形式，并为数论中的重要假设提供新的表述方式。
AI.method: 基于傅里叶-拉普拉斯变换在复平面垂直线上的评估，将随机变量的矩生成函数与积分权重关联，建立复分数矩的一般表达式。应用于高斯分布得到倒伽马函数的积分表示，形式化抛物型梅林变换作为经典梅林变换的替代，将垂直线映射到抛物轮廓以避免收敛带问题。
AI.result: 获得了倒伽马函数的全局积分表示，统一了其反射关系；建立了抛物型梅林变换作为全纯替代；得到了Hurwitz和黎曼zeta函数在整个临界带有效的亚纯表示；重新表述了黎曼假设和林德勒夫假设。
AI.conclusion: 提出的统一积分框架和抛物型梅林变换为复分数矩分析提供了新工具，为特殊函数提供了更广泛的表示，并为数论中的重要问题提供了新的表述视角，具有理论和应用价值。

title: Non-hyperelliptic modular curves of genus 3
comment: Typos in the labels of the curves in lines 31, 35, 36, 38, 39, 41, 42, and 43 of Table 1 have been fixed. The equation in line 41 has also been corrected, with respect to the published version
summary: A curve $C$ defined over $\mathbb Q$ is modular of level $N$ if there exists a non-constant morphism from $X_1(N)$ onto $C$ defined over $\mathbb Q$ for some positive integer $N$. We provide a sufficient and necessary condition for the existence of a modular non-hyperelliptic curve $C$ of genus $3$ and level $N$ such that $\mathrm{Jac}{(C)}$ is $\mathbb Q$-isogenous to a given three dimensional $\mathbb Q$-quotient of $J_1 (N)$. Using this criterion, we present an algorithm to compute explicitly equations for modular non-hyperelliptic curves of genus $3$. Let $C$ be a modular curve of level $N$, we say that $C$ is new if the corresponding morphism between $J_1(N)$ and $\mathrm{Jac}{(C)}$ factors through the new part of $J_1(N)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了模曲线理论，提供了判断是否存在亏格为3的非超椭圆模曲线的充要条件，并给出了计算这类曲线显式方程的算法。
AI.motivation: 研究模曲线的存在性和显式构造问题，特别是亏格为3的非超椭圆曲线，这对于理解模形式和椭圆曲线之间的联系具有重要意义。
AI.method: 提出了一个充要条件来判断是否存在亏格为3的非超椭圆模曲线，其雅可比簇与给定的J₁(N)的三维Q-商同构。基于此条件，设计了一个算法来显式计算这类模曲线的方程。
AI.result: 建立了判断模曲线存在性的理论框架，并开发了计算显式方程的算法，能够处理"新"模曲线的情况（即对应的态射通过J₁(N)的新部分）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为模曲线的显式构造提供了有效的理论工具和计算方法，特别关注亏格为3的非超椭圆情况，推进了模曲线理论的发展。

title: On the local-global principle for twists of abelian varieties
summary: This paper investigates the existence of a local-global principle for certain twists of abelian varieties defined over number fields. Our main focus is to determine when, for $m$ a positive integer, locally $m$-atic twists of an abelian variety $A$ over a number field $K$ are globally $m$-atic. We define and study a "Tate-Shafarevich cohomology set" that governs the obstruction to the local-global principle for $m$-atic twists. We prove that, under some mild assumptions, this set is finite, and give criteria for it to be trivial, i.e. for the local-global principle to be satisfied.

AI.tldr: 研究数域上阿贝尔簇的局部-整体原理，特别是m-atic扭曲的局部-整体问题，定义了控制该原理障碍的Tate-Shafarevich上同调集，证明了其在温和条件下的有限性，并给出了局部-整体原理成立的条件。
AI.motivation: 研究数域上阿贝尔簇扭曲的局部-整体原理，探索何时局部m-atic扭曲能够成为全局m-atic扭曲，这是代数数论和算术几何中的重要问题。
AI.method: 定义并研究了"Tate-Shafarevich上同调集"作为局部-整体原理的障碍，在温和假设下证明该集合的有限性，并给出其平凡化的判据。
AI.result: 证明了Tate-Shafarevich上同调集在温和条件下是有限的，并给出了该集合平凡（即局部-整体原理成立）的具体判据。
AI.conclusion: 建立了数域上阿贝尔簇m-atic扭曲的局部-整体原理理论框架，提供了判断该原理是否成立的数学工具和判据，深化了对阿贝尔簇算术性质的理解。

title: Classifying binary quadratic forms using Clifford invariants
comment: 43 pages, Accepted in Proceedings of the Indian Academy of Sciences: Mathematical Sciences
summary: We functorially identify similarity classes of line-bundle-valued quadratic forms on rank two vector bundles with isomorphism classes of pairs consisting of the degree zero and the degree one parts of the associated generalized Clifford algebras. As applications, we generalize the Gauss Composition and explore connections with Picard groups of quadratic algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文将线丛值二次型与广义Clifford代数的度零和度一部分的同构类进行函子性对应，推广了高斯合成并探索了与二次代数Picard群的联系。
AI.motivation: 研究秩二向量丛上线丛值二次型的相似类与广义Clifford代数结构之间的关系，建立系统性的对应关系以推广经典理论。
AI.method: 通过函子性方法，将线丛值二次型的相似类与广义Clifford代数的度零和度一部分的同构类进行对应，建立系统的对应关系。
AI.result: 成功建立了秩二向量丛上线丛值二次型相似类与广义Clifford代数两部分同构类之间的函子性对应，推广了高斯合成定理。
AI.conclusion: 该对应为研究二次型理论提供了新视角，揭示了与二次代数Picard群的联系，为代数几何中的二次型研究开辟了新方向。

title: Computing class groups and gonalities of algebraic curves over finite fields
summary: We give practical algorithms for computing the divisor class group and the gonality of a curve over a finite field, achieving several orders of magnitude speedup over existing methods for sufficiently large genus or residue field. The approach relies on introducing a precomputation step involving power series-expansions, which allows for an efficient amortized computation of large numbers of Riemann-Roch spaces.

AI.tldr: 提出计算有限域上曲线除子类群和gonality的实用算法，相比现有方法在足够大亏格或剩余域时实现数个数量级加速
AI.motivation: 现有计算曲线除子类群和gonality的方法在处理大亏格或大有限域时效率较低，需要更高效的算法
AI.method: 引入基于幂级数展开的预计算步骤，实现大量Riemann-Roch空间的高效摊销计算
AI.result: 相比现有方法，在足够大亏格或剩余域情况下实现数个数量级的计算速度提升
AI.conclusion: 通过幂级数展开预计算技术，显著提高了计算有限域上曲线除子类群和gonality的效率

title: Dimension bounds for relative character varieties on the projective line with three punctures $G=GL(r), O(r), Sp(r)$
summary: We consider relative character varieties on $\mathbb{P}^1\backslash\{0,1,\infty\}$ with $G=GL(r), O(r)$, or $Sp(r)$. Using a diagrammatic method of Simpson's, we give an explicit linear upper bound $R(d)$ on the rank $r$ of an MC-minimal character variety of dimension $d>2$. An arbitrary character variety is isomorphic, via Katz's middle convolution, to one satisfying the bound. For the general linear and non-overlapping quadratic cases, the bounds we give are the sharpest possible using this method.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究相对特征簇，使用Simpson的图解法给出了MC-极小特征簇秩r的显式线性上界R(d)，并通过Katz中间卷积证明任意特征簇都满足该界。
AI.motivation: 研究相对特征簇在代数几何和表示论中的重要性，特别是在GL(r)、O(r)和Sp(r)群下的结构，寻求对这些簇维度和秩之间关系的更好理解。
AI.method: 采用Simpson的图解法，结合Katz的中间卷积技术，对特征簇进行分析和变换，推导出秩的线性上界。
AI.result: 得到了MC-极小特征簇秩r的显式线性上界R(d)，其中d>2。对于一般线性和非重叠二次情况，该界是使用此方法可能得到的最优结果。
AI.conclusion: 通过Katz中间卷积，任意特征簇都同构于满足该线性上界的簇，这为相对特征簇的研究提供了重要的理论工具和界限。

title: Translational surfaces and iterated resultants
summary: A translational surface is a tensor product surface constructed from two space curves by translating one along the other. These surfaces are common within geometric modeling and, since their description is parametric, it is desirable to obtain the implicit equation of such a surface. These surfaces have been studied thoroughly by Goldman and Wang, where a particular set of syzygies was identified and shown to yield the implicit equation through an inhomogeneous resultant. As this method may fail in the presence of ill-behaved basepoints of the parameterization, we offer an alternative method in this article using iterated homogeneous resultants. The algorithm presented here involves smaller Sylvester matrices overall, potentially resulting in faster computation, and succeeds in many instances where the previous method cannot be applied.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种使用迭代齐次结式的新方法，用于计算平移曲面的隐式方程，相比之前的方法能处理参数化中的病态基点问题，且计算效率更高。
AI.motivation: 平移曲面在几何建模中很常见，但参数化描述需要转换为隐式方程。Goldman和Wang的方法在参数化存在病态基点时会失败，因此需要一种更鲁棒的方法。
AI.method: 使用迭代齐次结式方法，通过较小的Sylvester矩阵计算隐式方程，相比之前的非齐次结式方法更稳定。
AI.result: 新方法在计算上更高效（矩阵更小），且能在许多先前方法无法处理的情况下成功计算隐式方程。
AI.conclusion: 提出的迭代齐次结式方法为平移曲面隐式化提供了更鲁棒和高效的替代方案，特别是在处理病态基点参数化时。

title: The GKZ hypergeometric $\mathcal D$-module
summary: For an $(n\times N)$-matrix $A$ of rank $n$ with integer entries, Gelfand, Kapranov and Zelevinsky introduce a system of differential equations, called the $A$-hypergeometric system. We define the GKZ hypergeometric $\mathcal D$-module using cohomological functors, which is closely related to the $A$-hypergeometric $\mathcal D$-module. We prove the GKZ hypergeometric $\mathcal D$-module is holonomic and is an integrable connection of rank $n!\mathrm{vol}(Δ_\infty)$ on the Zariski open subset parametrizing nondegenerate Laurent polynomials, where $Δ_\infty$ is the Newton polytope at $\infty$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了GKZ超几何D-模的性质，证明了其在非退化洛朗多项式参数化区域上是秩为n!vol(Δ∞)的全纯可积联络。
AI.motivation: 研究Gelfand、Kapranov和Zelevinsky引入的A-超几何系统，通过上同调函子定义GKZ超几何D-模，探索其与A-超几何D-模的关系，并分析其代数几何性质。
AI.method: 使用上同调函子定义GKZ超几何D-模，通过代数几何和D-模理论的方法，证明该模的全纯性以及在非退化洛朗多项式参数化区域上的可积联络性质。
AI.result: 证明了GKZ超几何D-模是全纯的，并且在参数化非退化洛朗多项式的Zariski开子集上，它是一个秩为n!vol(Δ∞)的可积联络，其中Δ∞是无穷远处的牛顿多面体。
AI.conclusion: GKZ超几何D-模具有重要的代数几何性质，它不仅是全纯的，而且在适当的参数区域内构成可积联络，其秩由无穷远处牛顿多面体的体积决定，这为超几何系统的研究提供了新的视角。

title: On rational chain connectedness of globally +-regular varieties
summary: We prove that globally $+$-regular varieties are rationally chain connected in dimension three and mixed characteristic with residue field characteristic $p>5$. We also introduce a notion of strongly globally $+$-regular, and show that varieties of arbitrary dimension which are strongly globally $+$-regular over a dense open subset of $\mathrm{Spec}(\mathbb{Z})$ are rationally chain connected.

AI.tldr: 证明了在三维和混合特征（剩余域特征p>5）下，全局+正则簇是有理链连通的；引入强全局+正则概念，证明在Spec(ℤ)稠密开子集上强全局+正则的任意维簇是有理链连通的
AI.motivation: 研究代数几何中全局+正则簇的有理链连通性，特别是在三维和混合特征情况下的性质，并推广到更高维度的情形
AI.method: 1. 证明在三维和混合特征（剩余域特征p>5）下，全局+正则簇是有理链连通的；2. 引入强全局+正则的新概念；3. 证明在Spec(ℤ)稠密开子集上强全局+正则的任意维簇是有理链连通的
AI.result: 1. 证明了三维混合特征（p>5）下全局+正则簇的有理链连通性；2. 建立了强全局+正则与有理链连通性的普遍联系，适用于任意维度的簇
AI.conclusion: 全局+正则性在适当条件下蕴含有理链连通性，新引入的强全局+正则概念为研究更高维度的有理链连通性提供了有效工具，扩展了代数几何中正特征方法的适用范围

title: Automorphisms of Smooth Hypersurfaces with Fixed Loci of Codimension at Most Two
summary: We study automorphisms of smooth hypersurfaces in projective space $\mathbb{P}^{n+1}$ whose fixed loci have codimension at most two for $n\geq2$. While classifications of possible orders of automorphisms are known, our aim is to explore the relationship between the order of an automorphism and its algebraic and geometric properties. In this paper, we show that the assumption on the fixed locus restricts the possible orders of automorphisms. Moreover, when the fixed locus has codimension at most two, we investigate the rationality of quotient spaces associated with automorphisms whose orders are multiples of $d-1$ or $d$, where $d$ denotes the degree of the hypersurface.

AI.tldr: 研究射影空间中光滑超曲面自同构，其不动点集的余维数不超过2，探索自同构阶数与代数几何性质的关系，特别关注阶数为d-1或d倍数时商空间的有理性。
AI.motivation: 虽然已知自同构可能阶数的分类，但本文旨在探索自同构阶数与其代数和几何性质之间的关系，特别是当不动点集具有较小余维数时的情形。
AI.method: 研究射影空间$\mathbb{P}^{n+1}$中光滑超曲面的自同构，限制不动点集的余维数不超过2（$n\geq2$），分析这种限制对自同构可能阶数的影响，并特别关注阶数为超曲面度数$d-1$或$d$倍数时的商空间有理性问题。
AI.result: 证明了对不动点集的余维数限制会约束自同构的可能阶数。当不动点集余维数不超过2时，研究了阶数为$d-1$或$d$倍数的自同构所对应商空间的有理性性质。
AI.conclusion: 不动点集的几何条件对自同构阶数有重要限制作用，且当自同构阶数与超曲面度数有特定关系时，相关商空间的有理性问题值得深入研究。

title: Spectrum, Tjurina spectrum, and Hertling conjecture for singularities of modality $\leq 3$
comment: This is an early version of https://link.springer.com/article/10.1134/S0081543825601261
summary:
Spectrum is an important numerical invariant of an isolated hypersurface singularity, connecting its topological and analytic structures. The well-known Hertling conjecture tells the relation of range and variance of exponents i.e. elements of spectrum. For trimodal singularities, we compute their spectra and verify Hertling conjecture for them.
  Jung, Kim, Saito and Yoon recently defined Tjurina spectrum, stemming from Hodge ideals. This set of numerical invariants is a subset of spectrum in Steenbrink's sense. We give an estimation of exponents not in Tjurina spectrum and propose a similar Generalized Hertling Conjecture for Tjurina Spectrum. Moreover, we prove the conjecture for singularities of modality $\leq 3$.

AI.tldr: 计算了三模态奇点的谱并验证了Hertling猜想，提出了Tjurina谱的广义Hertling猜想并证明了模态≤3的奇点
AI.motivation: 谱是孤立超曲面奇点的重要数值不变量，连接其拓扑和解析结构。Hertling猜想描述了谱指数范围和方差的关系，需要验证该猜想。同时，Tjurina谱作为谱的子集，需要研究其性质并提出相应的猜想。
AI.method: 计算了三模态奇点的谱，验证了Hertling猜想。定义了Tjurina谱，估算了不在Tjurina谱中的指数，提出了Tjurina谱的广义Hertling猜想。
AI.result: 成功计算了三模态奇点的谱并验证了Hertling猜想。提出了Tjurina谱的广义Hertling猜想，并证明了该猜想对于模态≤3的奇点成立。
AI.conclusion: 研究验证了Hertling猜想对于三模态奇点的正确性，提出了Tjurina谱的广义Hertling猜想并在低模态情况下证明了该猜想，为奇点谱理论的发展提供了新的方向和结果。

title: Dimension of fixed loci of diagonalizable groups via algebraic cobordism
summary: We determine all restrictions on the dimension of the fixed locus of a diagonalizable group acting on a smooth projective variety that arise from the Chern numbers of the ambient variety. We reduce the problem to finding lower bounds for actions of p-groups, which we achieve by analyzing the equivariant cobordism ring with the help of the concentration theorem. To do so, we construct enough explicit examples of actions that realize the expected lower bound. We then prove that this family is maximal in the equivariant cobordism ring, in an appropriate sense.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了可对角化群在光滑射影簇上作用时固定点集维度的所有可能限制，这些限制来源于环境簇的陈数。
AI.motivation: 研究可对角化群在光滑射影簇上作用时，固定点集维度可能受到的限制，这些限制来源于环境簇的陈数。这是一个代数几何和拓扑学中的基本问题。
AI.method: 1. 将问题简化为寻找p-群作用的下界；2. 利用集中定理分析等变配边环；3. 构造足够多的显式作用例子来实现预期的下界；4. 证明这个例子族在等变配边环中是最大的（在适当意义下）。
AI.result: 确定了所有可能的固定点集维度限制，找到了p-群作用的下界，并构造了实现这些下界的显式例子族。
AI.conclusion: 本文完全刻画了可对角化群在光滑射影簇上作用时固定点集维度的所有陈数限制，通过等变配边环的方法和显式构造解决了这一问题。

title: Generically log smooth families via generators and relations
summary: Let $f\colon X \to \mathbb{A}^1_t$ be an affine flat morphism of finite type, and let $V = f^{-1}(0)$. Then, we obtain a morphism of log schemes $f\colon (X|V) \to (\mathbb{A}^1_t|0)$. In this article, we develop algorithmic tools to study the log-geometric properties of $f$ by means of a presentation \[Γ(X,\mathcal{O}_X) = \Bbbk[t,x_1,\ldots,x_n]/(f_1,\ldots,f_r).\] We obtain similar tools for projective flat morphisms when the homogeneous coordinate ring is given by generators and relations. We provide an implementation of our algorithms in Macaulay2. In a slightly different direction, we give some results on the sheaf $\mathcal{LS}_V$ of log smooth structures on a toroidal crossing scheme $(V,\mathcal{P},\barρ)$.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了研究对数几何性质的算法工具，针对仿射平坦态射和射影平坦态射，提供了Macaulay2实现，并探讨了环面交叉方案上的对数光滑结构层。
AI.motivation: 研究对数几何中的算法工具，特别是针对由生成元和关系给出的仿射平坦态射和射影平坦态射，以计算其对数几何性质。
AI.method: 开发基于代数表示的算法：对于仿射情形，利用环表示Γ(X,𝒪_X) = 𝕜[t,x₁,...,xₙ]/(f₁,...,fᵣ)；对于射影情形，利用齐次坐标环的生成元和关系。在Macaulay2中实现这些算法。
AI.result: 成功开发了研究对数几何性质的算法工具，实现了对仿射平坦态射和射影平坦态射的对数几何分析，并提供了Macaulay2实现。同时获得了环面交叉方案上对数光滑结构层𝒮𝒮_V的一些结果。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了系统化的算法工具来研究对数几何性质，填补了代数几何与计算代数几何之间的空白，为对数几何的计算研究提供了实用工具。
